channel.title: Serv crashing HELP & 2 commands needed
channel.description:
ok im running my server as usual and have about 20-30 ppl on and randomly this happens every so often and im like shit how do i fix this...
anyone that can help i will rep i guess :( so help fast!
heres pix of the run server box with the error
[IMG]http://i283.photobucket.com/albums/kk310/silabgarza/servbox.jpg[/img]
edit: also i need a command that can unmute/mute ppl
i need it so if u type ::mute player1 it will mute them (instead of mods having 2 use the report abuse thing)
also i need the unmute for it :) i need it so if u type ::unmute player1 it will unmute them (so i dont have 2 go into the files and change it...)
[size=15pt]rep++ 2 any help :) thanks[/size]

item.title: Serv crashing HELP & 2 commands needed
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok im running my server as usual and have about 20-30 ppl on and randomly this happens every so often and im like shit how do i fix this…

anyone that can help i will rep i guess so help fast!

heres pix of the run server box with the error

edit: also i need a command that can unmute/mute ppl

i need it so if u type ::mute player1
it will mute them (instead of mods having 2 use the report abuse thing)

also i need the unmute for it
i need it so if u type ::unmute player1
it will unmute them (so i dont have 2 go into the files and change it…)

[size=15pt]rep++ 2 any help thanks[/size]
